# Wedding Photo Upload Web App

This is a single-page web application for uploading wedding photos to Google Drive with the following features:
- Elegant, mobile-responsive design
- Drag-and-drop file upload interface
- Progress bar for upload feedback
- Optional guest name field
- Secure Google Drive integration
- Modern web standards (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript)
- Data privacy and security considerations

## Project Structure
- HTML5 for semantic markup
- CSS3 for responsive styling and animations
- Vanilla JavaScript for functionality
- Google Drive API integration
- Local development server setup

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript features
- Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Follow security best practices for file uploads
- Optimize for performance and user experience
